name: Keith
text: Papa Murphy's is no longer open at this address. It is now a sushi and hibachi bar. That is complete BS!  Raw fish, really? do you people have any idea how far away fresh fish is? People in Indiana eat things like pizza and burgers and steaks not stinking  uncooked üêü!

name: supahonkey
text: This place has the best pizza in Brownsburg.  We always get the Papa's Favorite and it comes with the most ingredients relative to all other pizza places I've tried.   With that being said, they usually have pretty poor service.  I usually ‚Ä¶More

name: robert barnitt
text: Excellent pozza but this location has since closed up.

name: Bryan Sobek
text: A lot of rage on here for this location. I think it's fantastic. Always quick, and I've ordered here more than 5 times. Never had an issue. Sad others aren't very forgiving. Especially when you send someone to pick up an order and don't ‚Ä¶More

name: Doug Kalnajs
text: 1st off always Good Pizza.. now to the bad.. WORST SERVICE EVER Not sure who Hired the Little Rude ass Kid behind the Counter but he needs a Serious Attitude adjustment.. you dont order your food for pickup and see it in the Rack when you ‚Ä¶More

name: Matt Hendryx
text: I have gotten food poisoning from Brownsburg twice and I've only eaten there 4 times.  I have gotten pizzas from Carmel and Avon and never had an issue.  Do not eat here.  You could get very sick.

name: Pat Powers
text: Food is reasonably priced, good Ingredients good pizza

name: Dave Young
text: Delicious pizza, and with $10 Tuesday's for a large pizza you can't go wrong.  The desert pizza is fabulous also...

name: John Fletcher
text: Easy, convenient, fair pricing, great taste pizza, pretty friendly, depends on whose working. Can't find a good reason to rate it below 5 stars.

name: Kim Garner
text: Worst service. Can't even get the order right. They charged me for cheesy bread and didn't even get it. Sent my husband to pick up the pizza and I said where's the bread? I will only order from places that deliver.

name: Nic R
text: Rude employees. Pizza poorly made. Long waits.

name: kevin davidson
text: Worst service ever!!!!!!! Had to wait over 30 mins after ordering to get my pizza... even after many ppl behind me ordered and left.... WILL NEVER GO BACK TO THIS STORE EVER
